plot outline: The word Thandava suggests the dance of lord Shiva (Rudra Thandava), the dance of destruction. The film tells us the story of how a common man balances the evil and the good that his family members and he are facing. About how the protagonist faces his hurdles and survives. With a well composed background score and songs by Sathish Aaryan of Pade Pade fame, Thandava is a complete family entertainer.
